member.name: FaceCharacterization
member.summary: The FaceCharacterization structure describes the blob format for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_FACEROICHARACTERIZATIONS attribute.

member.name: FaceCharacterization.BlinkScoreLeft
member.summary: 0 indicates no blink for the left eye, 100 indicates definite blink for the left eye (0 - 100).

member.name: FaceCharacterization.BlinkScoreRight
member.summary: 0 indicates no blink for the right eye, 100 indicates definite blink for the right eye (0 - 100).

member.name: FaceCharacterization.FacialExpressionScore
member.summary: 0 indicates no such facial expression as identified, 100 indicates definite such facial expression as defined (0 - 100).
